title: Shek Sau
text: Shek Sau (, born Chan Shek-sau, Bill, 21 November 1947) is a <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> actor working for <a href="TVB">TVB</a>. His son <a href="Sam%20Chan">Sam Chan</a> also works for TVB as an actor. In 2005, they appeared in a cooking show together for a <a href="Father%27s%20Day">Father's Day</a> promotion.
